abstract: Several attacks involving explosives hidden in Afghan turbans have prompted vigorously enforced rule on searching headgear for weapons; searches are deeply disturbing for most Afghan men, as turban signifies one's faith and is national dress--not to mention being something of a fashion statement.
snippet: After several attacks using explosives hidden in turbans, a rule on inspecting the headgear is stirring anger.
lead_paragraph: After several attacks using explosives hidden in turbans, a rule on inspecting the headgear is stirring anger.

headline.main: Afghan Symbol of Identity Is Subject to Search
headline.print_headline: Searches of Turbans, Symbols Of Identity, Rattle Afghans
headline.seo: Afghans Are Rattled by Rule on Searching Turbans
